name: torch-infer
description: (DEPRECATED, will be removed in 7 days) A runtime program to run inference and calculate the scores of Hybrid QNN models with Pytorch.

model.description: A hybrid QNN model to be used for inference.

data.description: A PyTorch data loader object containing the inference dataset.

shots.description: The number of shots used for each circuit evaluation. Defaults to 1024.

measurement_error_mitigation.description: Whether to apply measurement error mitigation in form of a complete measurement fitter to the measurements. Defaults to False.

prediction.description: The result of applying model on inference data.

score.description: If provided, result of applying scoring function on prediction results.
